title: Backstage, Alternative Fashion Show, Palladium Club, New York City
marks:
Signature; Date; Title; Edition

in pencil, bott in pencil, LRC on back: [Toby Old 1996]
description: 2 standing women at R: one wearing a lace-up vinyl top, looking toward her PR and holding a cigarette in her PR hand; other woman wearing a snakeskin printed jumpsuit with heavy makeup and rubber snakes in her hair; man in leather jacket and baseball cap at L applying lipstick to seated woman in fur-trimmed bikini
creditline: Gift of the Artist, by exchange
